alert.note: Alert for Caswell; Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rockingham and western Caswell Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monroeton, or 8 miles south of Reidsville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reidsville... Yanceyville... Bethel... Jericho... Camp Springs... Quick... and Ruffin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central North Carolina...and south central and west central Virginia.
